title.rendered: Zach West, Account Manager Mid Atlantic

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Zach_West_Scientific_Recruiter.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Image” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”left” sticky=”off” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” always_center_on_mobile=”on”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

Zach West, Account Manager Mid Atlantic

After graduating from Assumption College in 2016 with his bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Zach started his own custom stone masonry business, a trade he had learned through family at a young age. After completing several residential and commercial jobs, he knew it was time to utilize his degree. Zach then began his career with ClinLab Staffing in January of 2018 as an entry level recruiter. He started out under Matt Logano and with great coaching and resilience, he quickly became a top recruiter in the company.

With his steady work ethic and determination, he has since worked his way up to an Account Manager role, earning the opportunity to grow out the Mid-Atlantic Division. Zach primarily works within R&D, Quality and Manufacturing. Outside of ClinLab, Zach enjoys staying active by intramural sports (hockey/football), fishing and hiking. Guitar has been a passion of his for over 15 years and he loves recording music in his spare time.

Massachusetts Office

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
